QuestData.Title: The Crucible of Carnage: The Deadly Dragonmaw!
QuestData.Description: You're going to love this one! The Dragonmaw heard you were entering the arena and they're determined to make sure you don't leave it.$B$BTime for some good ol' $r on orc action! Let me know when you're ready to do this!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Breaking the will of a black dragon is the first step towards becoming a Dragonmaw champion. This champion will not be entering the arena alone.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Ain't no lovin' like troll lovin'.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Crucible of Carnage and defeat Torg Drakeflayer!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at the Crucible of Carnage in the Twilight Highlands.
